ygData.subject: About Unrest
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello fellow Wizards, I recently hit level 12 and am currently traveling with a group in and around Daggnors Cauldron. If we are hunting Goblin Mariners or
ygData.messageBody:
Hello fellow Wizards,
I recently hit level 12 and am currently traveling with a group in and around Daggnors Cauldron. If we are hunting Goblin Mariners or shamans,my spells will hit, however if we bring in a Bosun,my spells are completely resisted. Some in the group are getting tired of these and want to go into Unrest. Will I be able to damage any MOBS there? The group consists of a 13 Ranger,14 Cleric,Myself 12 Wizard and a 16 Paladin (I know, the exp gap is large and I get minimal exp, but heck...these are friends). Can anyone give any pointers about what lie ahead in Unrest for our group. Oh By the Way.....the NPC's at the Camp along the coast do NOT Always help protect you...We all learned that the hard way against a Tidal Lord!

Thanks for any help,
Kueken Mith Marr
